document_data.caption: A map showing the Sacred Grove on Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Sacred Grove of the Earthmother
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sacred Grove of the Earthmother''', which was also simply called the '''Sacred Grove''', was a small forest located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The Sacred Grove was located within the southeast region of [[Myrloch Vale]] nestled between the [[Myrloch]] and western slopes of the [[Cambro Mountains]].
